description:
Discover, investigate and help! Chalk creatures will entrust you with their secrets and help you get to inaccessible places.

Make a decision!
It's up to you which path you will take - be like a lion, a brave turtle, or maybe a wise owl!

Fun for the whole family!
Sit down together and choose which animals you will make a pact with. Exercise patience and perceptiveness. Learn a touching story together.

Key features:

- plush animals
- Chalky, pastel graphics
- touching story
- relaxing funky style soundtrack
- animal hats in 3 styles
name: Chalk Gardens
